alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 25 at 2:37AM MST until January 26 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected, especially below Tijeras canyon. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 2 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on north to south oriented roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
